faqs.question: What services do you offer?
faqs.answer: We offer end-to-end software development services including custom web applications, mobile apps (iOS & Android), desktop software, and cloud solutions. We also provide UI/UX design and software consulting.

faqs.question: How much does a mobile app cost?
faqs.answer: The cost of a mobile app can vary greatly depending on complexity, features, and platforms. A simple app might start from $10,000, while more complex projects can range from $50,000 to $100,000+. Would you like to schedule a free consultation for a more accurate estimate?

faqs.question: How do I get started with a project?
faqs.answer: Getting started is easy! 1) We schedule a call to discuss your idea. 2) We provide a preliminary analysis and estimate. 3) We draft a project plan. 4) You approve, and we begin development! Would you like to schedule that first call?

faqs.question: Do you develop websites?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We develop everything from simple brochure websites to complex, database-driven web applications and e-commerce platforms.

faqs.question: What technologies do you use?
faqs.answer: We use a modern and robust tech stack. For web: Python/Django, JavaScript/React, Node.js. For mobile: Native (Swift, Kotlin) and Cross-platform (Flutter). We choose the best tool for your specific project needs.

faqs.question: How long does a typical project take?
faqs.answer: Timelines depend on project scope. A simple website might take 4-6 weeks. A medium-complexity mobile app could take 3-6 months. We provide a detailed timeline after the initial project analysis.

faqs.question: Greeting
faqs.answer: Hello! Welcome to Rayonix Solutions. How can I assist you today?

faqs.question: Thanks
faqs.answer: You're welcome! Is there anything else I can help you with?

faqs.question: Exit
faqs.answer: Thank you for chatting! Have a great day. Feel free to reach out again if you have more questions.
